timeline.bodyText:
I'm a bit worried that this will generate queries with paging all the time?
Especially in the context of https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/8162/files coming.
Can we make sure this is not the case?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
Admitedly this isn't the perfect solution (ideally toPanachePage wouldn't be called at all when Pageable is unpaged).
I guess with #8162 coming (I hadn't seen that one), we should be take care of it now. @aureamunoz would you like to do that or do you want me to?
replies.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: Hi, yes, I will take a look.

replies.bodyText: I just pushed another approach after look at the other PR (https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/8162/files ). WDYT? @geoand @gsmet

timeline.bodyText: How come this works? How is null handled?
timeline.author: geoand

replies.bodyText:
I looked into it, and null works because https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/master/extensions/panache/hibernate-orm-panache/runtime/src/main/java/io/quarkus/hibernate/orm/panache/runtime/PanacheQueryImpl.java#L176 properly handles null. So let's just add a comment.
We call list under the covers because of https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/master/extensions/spring-data-jpa/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/spring/data/deployment/generate/AbstractMethodsAdder.java#L172
replies.author: geoand

timeline.bodyText:
I think we need another method that return the make sure that the result  of songRepository.findAll(wholePage); is what we expect it to (that the page doesn't have a previous or next page).
Something like: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/master/integration-tests/spring-data-jpa/src/main/java/io/quarkus/it/spring/data/jpa/PersonResource.java#L135
